# HUD::SET_TEXT_CENTRE

## Summary
Centre justifies the text

## Parameters
* **BOOL** textCentreFlag

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
It also moves the origin of the text to the centre point.
